00017 #ifndef B3_GEN_RANDOM_H
00018 #define B3_GEN_RANDOM_H
00019 
00020 #include "b3Scalar.h"
00021 
00022 #ifdef MT19937
00023 
00024 #include <limits.h>
00025 #include <mt19937.h>
00026 
00027 #define B3_RAND_MAX UINT_MAX
00028 
00029 B3_FORCE_INLINE void         b3Srand(unsigned int seed) { init_genrand(seed); }
00030 B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int b3rand()                   { return genrand_int32(); }
00031 
00032 #else
00033 
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 
00036 #define B3_RAND_MAX RAND_MAX
00037 
00038 B3_FORCE_INLINE void         b3Srand(unsigned int seed) { srand(seed); } 
00039 B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int b3rand()                   { return rand(); }
00040 
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 inline b3Scalar b3RandRange(b3Scalar minRange, b3Scalar maxRange)
00044 {
00045         return (b3rand() / (b3Scalar(B3_RAND_MAX) + b3Scalar(1.0))) * (maxRange - minRange) + minRange;
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 #endif //B3_GEN_RANDOM_H
